metadata.name: PsiTransfer
metadata.description: PsiTransfer is a simple open source self-hosted file sharing solution. It's an alternative to paid services like Dropbox and WeTransfer. Features include no accounts or logins required, mobile friendly responsive interface, support for many and very big files with resumable uploads and downloads, expiring upload buckets, one-time downloads, password protected downloads, and admin dashboard.
metadata.author: BigBearTechWorld

environment_variables.name: PSITRANSFER_ADMIN_PASS
environment_variables.description: Admin password for /admin page. Leave empty to disable admin page.

environment_variables.name: PSITRANSFER_UPLOAD_PASS
environment_variables.description: Password required for uploading files. Leave empty to allow public uploads.

environment_variables.name: PSITRANSFER_REQUIRE_BUCKET_PASSWORD
environment_variables.description: Make the bucket password field mandatory.

environment_variables.name: PSITRANSFER_MAX_FILE_SIZE
environment_variables.description: Maximum file size in bytes. Leave empty for no limit.

environment_variables.name: PSITRANSFER_MAX_BUCKET_SIZE
environment_variables.description: Maximum bucket size in bytes. Leave empty for no limit.

environment_variables.name: PSITRANSFER_DEFAULT_RETENTION
environment_variables.description: Default retention time in seconds (604800 = 1 week).

environment_variables.name: PSITRANSFER_MAX_AGE
environment_variables.description: Maximum age for files in seconds (6480000 = 75 days).
